Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Usa vica uha hi digega jihara bara madabhaga hai
Jisa ne jhuthala'i'a ate muha mauri'a
Zi'ada darana vali'am nu usa tom surakhi'ata rakhi'a javega
Jihara pavitara hona la'i apani ja'idada dida hai
Ate usa da kise te, ko'i upakara nahim?Jisa da badala usa ne laina hove
Pratu sirafa apane azima alaha di khusi la'i
Ate jaladi hi uha prasana ho javega
Sahu hai, prakasama'i dina di
Ate rata di jadom uha (dina te) cha jave
Tuhade raba ne tuhanu nahim chadi'a ate na uha tuhade tom bemukha ho'i'a hai
Ate nisacita rupa nala praloka tuhade la'i sasara tom bihatara hai
Ate jaladi hi alaha tuhanu devega. Phira tu satusata ho javega
Ki alaha ne tuhanu anatha nahim dekhi'a, phira usa ne tuhanu tikana dita
Ate tuhanu labhana vala dekhi'a, tam usa ne tuhanu raha dikha'i'a
Ate tuhanu dhana hina dekhi'a, tam tuhanu (dhana daulata nala) sapana kara dita
Tam tusim anatham te sakhati na karo
Ate tusim bhikhari'am nu na jhirakau
Ate tusim apane raba de upakaram di usatata karom
Ki asim tuhada sina (dila) tuhade la'i nahim' khol'ha dita hai
Ate tuhada uha bhara laha dita
Jisa ne tuhadi pitha jhuka diti si
Ate asim' tuhade nama nu uca kara dita
Tam aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Besaka aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Phira tusim vihale ho javo ate (badagi la'i) mihanata kari'a karo
Ate apane raba vala apana dhi'ana laga'u
